greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominators of the partial sums of the reciprocals of the numbers (k + 1)*(5*k + 4) = 2*A005476(k+1), for k >= 0.
comment: The corresponding numerators are given in A294831. Details are found there.
formula: For this sum in terms of the digamma function Psi see A294831.
example: For the rationals V(5,4;n) see A294831.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Nov 18 2017
